items.sentence: Tom thought that Mary wouldn\'t want him at her wedding.
Tom knew where Mary wanted to spend her summer vacation.
Tom knew who Mary had decided to give her old guitar to.
Tom was a very good friend until he stole my girlfirend.
Maybe I should just tell Tom I want my money back today.
Tom needs to be told that he isn\'t required to do that.
Tom and Mary got back together after a trial separation.
Tom asked whether Mary knew what she was supposed to do.
My French wasn\'t good enough to make myself understood.
Tom started to say something, and then changed his mind.
